sentence: The new additions are John Duarte in California's 13th District, Colin Schmitt in New York's 18th, April Becker in Nevada's 3rd, Marc Molinaro in New York's 19th, Jim Bognet in Pennsylvania's 8th, and Cassy Garcia in Texas' 28th.
author:
Stephanie Akin
Kate Ackley
Mary Ellen McIntire
title: At the Races: NY state of turmoil
